content:
Hello, 

I hope you are doing well.

After submitting PSET1 for 6.100A, I have received 0%, even though when checking the auto-grader all responses are the same as the expected result. I believe my mistake was forgetting to name a variable "steps" which I named  "guesses". 

Can i possibly get a credit/higher grade for this?

Thank you so much for your understanding !
subject: I have received 0% in PSET 1 part C, while my code's results are correct

content: If you received a 0 on the pset, it will be manually graded by a TA. In the future, remember to read the pset instructions carefully!
